attributes.action: Bring back capital punishment, bring in a national police force, ABOLISH POLITICAL CORRECTNESS!!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Prisons overcrowded, just as it was in the 19th century, murderers getting out of jail after a few years, sometimes pardoned after a few months...
As well as waiting several days/weeks for a police officer to come to your house, spend 10 minutes just to report a crime, if there was a national police force, that also controlled the county police forces, maybe the police'd get a little respect from the public...
Political correctness has gone too far! A blackboard is ALSO a chalkboard, why do we not call a whiteboard a dry-wipe marker board... THE GOVERNMENT is racist by putting in these ridiculous laws!!!
